document.full_text: air traffic controllers mistakenly told the pilot of a plane carrying u.s. first lady michelle obama this week he was further away from a nearby military cargo jet than he actually was, according to a report issued on friday.
document.title: first lady's jet got wrong info on other plane
lines_and_colors: air traffic controllers mistakenly told the pilot of a plane carrying u.s. first lady michelle obama this week he was further away from a nearby military cargo jet than he actually was, according to a report issued on friday.
